data.name: ZombLabs
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to ZombLabs!

ZombLabs is an action packed Horror-Survival FPS. Fight your way through an epic battle against endless waves of zombies. Get ready for a ridiculous amount of fun!



  • 6 different scenarios
  • Endless waves of various zombies and bosses
  • Many different Quests, Upgrades and Power Ups
  • Smooth gameplay with up to 60 FPS
  • 64-bit Support
  • Ranking System and Online-highscore list
  • Lifetime free updates



Fight your way through an epic battle in 6 different scenarios. Fight against the zombies in a castle, a World War II bunker, in an office, on a space station and more.
Each Scenario is different. Every Scenario comes with different types of Weapons, Zombies and Specials.



In ZombLabs you fight against endless waves of various zombies and bosses. With every round the number and the strength of the zombies increases. The bosses are where it gets really interesting - with different and special attacks they try to force you to your knees



In the game, you will find different Quests which will give you extra points. The Quests make the game dynamic and bring the player to his limits. With the points you can buy upgrades and power ups. You also get points for every zombie that you killed. Be smart and survive as long as you can!



Fight against your friends and enemies for the best score. The game includes online highscore lists and a level system. Not interested? It is an optional feature. The game is still fully playable offline!



Do we need to say anything else? Many achievements, 6 Steam Trading Cards, Profile Backgrounds, Badges and so much more! The complete Steam experience

data.short_description: ZombLabs is an action packed Horror-Survival FPS. Fight your way through an epic battle against endless waves of zombies. Get ready for a ridiculous amount of fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processeur : Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Mémoire vive : 2 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX : Version 9.0c
  • Espace disque : 6 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processeur : Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Mémoire vive : 4 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0
  • DirectX : Version 9.0c
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 6 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

data.legal_notice: A Game by PatchNoteStudio. Music by Alex Lisi. Icons by icons8 and Flaticon. Emoji art supplied by EmojiOne
